maqras.text: 25|53|Va Ust, ki du darjoro ʙa ham omext: in jake xusguvor va sirin ast va on jake suru talx va dar mijoni on du moneai nufuznopazire qaror dod [to ʙo ham najomezand]
25|54|Va Ust, ki insonro az oʙi [mani] ofarid va uro doroi pajvandi nasaʙi va saʙaʙi gardonid va Parvardigorat hamvora tavonost
25|55|Va [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo cizero meparastand, ki na ʙa onon sude meʙaxsad va na zijone merasonad va kofir dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoras pajvasta pustiʙon [-i sajton] ast
25|56|Va [ej pajomʙar] Mo turo cuz ʙasoratʙaxs va ʙimdihanda nafiristodem
25|57|Bigu: «Man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham, magar kase, ki ʙixohad rohe ʙa sui Parvardigoras ʙarguzinad [va hamin ʙarojam kofi ast]»
25|58|Va ʙar [Parvardigori] zindae, ki hargiz namemirad, tavakkal kun va ʙo citois Uro ʙa poki jod kun. Va hamin ʙas, ki U ʙa gunohoni ʙandagonas ogoh ast

25|59|[Hamon] Kase, ki osmonho va zamin va on ciro mijoni onhost dar sas ruz ofarid, sipas ʙar Ars qaror girift. [U Allohi] Rahmon ast, pas, dar mavridi U az on ki ogoh ast, ʙipurs [va U niz kase cuz Alloh taolo nest]

25|60|Va hangome ki ʙa ʙa onon gufta savad: «Baroi [Allohi] Rahmon sacda kuned», megujand: «Rahmon kist? Ojo [qaror ast] ʙar har ci tu amr mekuni sacda ʙarem»? Va [in da'vati tu duri az haq va] nafratasonro meafzojad
25|61|Purʙarakat [va ʙuzurgvor] ast, on ki dar osmon manzilgohhoe [ʙaroi sitoragon] qaror dod va dar [mijoni] onho xursed [-i duraxson] va mohi toʙone padid ovard
25|62|Va Ust, ki saʙu ruzro dar paji jakdigar qaror dod, ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad [az tadʙiri ilohi] pand girad jo siposguzor ʙosad

25|63|Va ʙandagoni [mu'minu soistai] Rahmon kasone hastand, ki ʙo furutani [va matonat] ʙar zamin roh meravand va hangome ki cohilon [ʙo suxanoni nopisand] xitoʙason mekunand, [ʙa coi talofi ʙo onon] ʙa neki suxan megujand
25|64|Va kasone ʙaroi Parvardigorason dar holi sacda va qijom saʙzindadori mekunand
25|65|Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, azoʙi duzaxro az mo ʙozgardon, [ki] ʙe tardid, azoʙas [saxtu] pojdor ast
25|66|Haqqo, ki duzax ʙad cojgoh va iqomatgohest
25|67|Va [mu'minon] kasone hastand, ki cun infoq menamojand, na zijodaravi mekunand va na saxtgiri va ʙajni in du [holat rohi] e'tidol pes megirand

25|68|Va kasone hastand, ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙude digar namexonand va kase, ki Alloh taolo [kustanasro] harom kardaast, cuz ʙa haq namekusand va zino namekunand. Va har ki in [gunohon]-ro murtakiʙ savad, kajfari gunohi [xes]-ro meʙinad
25|69|Ruzi qijomat azoʙas ducandon megardad va ʙo xori dar on [azoʙ] covidon memonad
25|70|Magar kase, ki tavʙa kunad va imon ovarad va kore soista ancom dihad. Pas, inonand, ki Alloh taolo ʙadihojasonro ʙa nekiho taʙdil mekunad va Alloh taolo hamvora omurzgoru mehruʙon ast
25|71|Va kase, ki tavʙa kunad va kore soista ancom dihad, pas, jaqinan ʙa dargohi Alloh taolo – cunon ki ʙojadu sojad – tavʙa kardaast

25|72|Va kasone [mu'minand], ki guvohii duruƣ namedihand [va dar macolisi ʙotil huzur namejoʙand] va cun ʙa [kori nopisand jo] ʙehudae ʙarxurd mekunand, ʙuzurgvorona [az kanoras] meguzarand [va xudro oluda namesozand]
25|73|Va kasone, ki cun ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason pand doda mesavand, [az on ƣaflat namekunand va dar ʙaroʙari Qur'on] cun karonu kuron nestand
25|74|Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, az hamsaronu farzandonamon [kasonero] ʙa mo ato farmo, ki [mojai sodii dilho va] ravsanii casmho ʙosand va moro pesvoi parhezkoron qaror ʙideh»
25|75|[Ore] Inon ʙa posi on ki sikeʙoi kardaand, manozil [-i olii ʙihist]-ro podos megirand va dar on co ʙo durudu salomi [faristagon] ru ʙa ru megardand
25|76|Dar on co covidonand. Ci naku cojgoh va [ci nek] iqomatgohe ast

25|77|[Ba kofiron] ʙigu: «Agar iʙodat va duojaton naʙosad, Parvardigoram e'tinoe ʙa sumo nadorad [va arzise ʙarojaton qoil nest]. Ba rosti, sumo [da'vati haqro] duruƣ angosted, pas, ʙa zudi [kajfari in kor] gireʙongiraton xohad sud
